website_summaries.verdict: A popular eyebrow pencil by Maybelline with features beauty enthusiasts love – rich colors, decent wear, and a mechanical pencil designed for precise application.
pros: Distances itself from other pencils on the market for the angled tip that's perfect for outlining brow shape and filling in sparse hairs
Mechanical, so it never needs sharpening
Made by a top makeup brand
cons: Tip may break if you don't apply it with a gentle touch

customer_reviews.title: If you have sparse eyebrows this is a godsend!
customer_reviews.text: I have little to no eyebrows. Penciling them in with something like the brow wiz with the tiny tip is pointless and takes forever and I run out in a month or less. This makes it easy and my brows look BOMB!!! I will buy this over and over and over
customer_reviews.author: Duchess

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Did not care for this at all. I use pencil on my brows, thought this would be a great alternative. This was way too soft. It make little tiny chunks when brushing brows and the color wasn’t right. Looked dark enough on the pencil thingy, but when applying, it looked like an auburn color. Not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Brow Definer.
customer_reviews.text: A friend had a similar-looking brow definer by Bobbi Brown, but I wasn't going to pay anywhere close to what that one cost. This one looks great and has plenty of long-lasting tint. I'm very happy with it. The only negative I would say is that I found it cheaper at a nearby retail store.
customer_reviews.author: Cycle Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Light-Dark Brown BROWS
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any shade of brows, except extremely dark brows, honestly. I am african American with medium-dark brown brows. I tried the medium brown and deep brown, but they were far too dark. I use the soft brown, and it is perfect! I love this brand. Great value and product. I am not a professional, nor am I that good with makeup, but it helps fill in my eyebrow spots with little hair (my natural eyebrows grow oddly)
customer_reviews.author: Noah Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Great for filling in eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: I have one eyebrow that literally is about half gone after having children. When my hair fell out after being pregnant, my eyebrow thinned significantly and hasn't filled back in. It's really hard to fill it in and make it look natural. This works great. I love that it also has the brush on the other end.
customer_reviews.author: KarenP

customer_reviews.title: and I really like it! What I learned after the first time ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the same eyebrow pen for a few years and it wasn't available on Amazon anymore. So I gave this a shot, and I really like it! What I learned after the first time applying it though is to press lightly while drawing them on. I looked pretty silly when I first did it because it was just way too dark and I was worried the color was wrong. Then I did it again pressing much lighter and the color matched way better and I didn't look so goofy.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, looks natural
customer_reviews.text: The diamond shaped makes all the difference! A pencil-like point just seems like too much work to apply and a big brush is only good when you have naturally thicker brows. This colors in my sparse eyebrows with a natural finish.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Lind

customer_reviews.title: Picky about my brow products
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but I'm a brow fanatic. I normally use another product, (double the price), which I love except for the fact that it's so fragile it ALWAYS broke on me. I got tired of the mess it would leave all over so I knew I had to find something new. I had found my last one at a brow shop in NYC so I was hesitant to look for somthing online let alone believe the reviews. Anyhow I am so glad I found this product! So much easier and half the price I was used to paying. I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: Seamar

customer_reviews.title: Redheads need to fill in our brows too!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that I'm a natural red head. I've got red hair and red eyebrows. Upon searching - many companies do not even offer options for red heads. Options that I found were far and few between - and not great. We need to fill in our brows too!! That being said - I purchased the blonde - and it is GREAT! The shape of the pencil is amazing. It gives you a usable edge that isn't as dramatic as a freshly sharpened pencil. The mascara-like brush end is also really great. I would recommend this to any of my family and friends. Will be purchasing this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: CMCP

customer_reviews.title: This is super easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I have what I call "chemo eyebrows" that are very light and have big bald areas. This is super easy to apply, and I love that it's not a powder that gets everywhere. Nor is it a pencil you have to sharpen. It's self contained and you can roll up more as needed like deodorant. The other side is a brush to blend it all together and really helps it look natural. Easy peasy for this non- makeup wearer to understand. Will definitely buy again when I use it up (in like 5 years! haha!)
customer_reviews.author: N. Head

customer_reviews.title: I never found one that I liked so I just tossed this one in my cart ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the Benefit brow pencils with the kits, but eventually got tired of spending $20 on a pencil. So I started buying random pencils at different places to find a comparable alternative. I never found one that I liked so I just tossed this one in my cart as an add on item. Really glad that I did. It works great and the design of the brush on the end is so much better than that of all the others I've used. This pencil is not oily, but also not too dry. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! I was using the Anastasia Brow pencil for years and decided to try this instead just to see how it was. I love the consistency and the way it applied to my brows. I went with the soft brown and it looked perfect with my platinum blonde hair. I couldn't believe how inexpensive it was. Will for sure be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this since I plucked and over waxed by brows I needed something to keep my brows from looking very sad and bare, this works in helping me fill in and shape my brows, nice color and great quality, it stays on and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has tried many brow products, I can say that this is one of the best. I have light-to medium blonde hair, and very often what some call "blonde" brow pencil is much too dark. The color of this one is just right. It is not hard like some pencils but also not so soft it is pasty. I love the shape because you can draw an outline or make little strokes with the point and fill in with the flat part. The fact that it is retractible and comes with a brush on the other end makes it my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria G.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what the hype is.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what is suppose to be so great about this product or the shape of the pencil? I didn’t like the fatter end/bottom. I thought maybe the different shape would offer an ingenious new realistic eyebrow look. I prefer the skinny pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: not enough product... Gets used up way too quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Pencil too soft..twice the tip broke off while trying to use... And that was it... Then there was none left! Would definitely not buy again !
customer_reviews.author: B. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Best tip for ease of use & natural look.
customer_reviews.text: Best eyebrow pencil I've found -- & I have about 5 I try to mix to get a fuller but natural look. This one actually is not too dark for blonde, the tips can be used for both thicker fill in, but tip can draw in individual hairs. Only improvement would be if it were waterproof/longer lasting. Have to b careful not to touch your brows or its gone.
customer_reviews.author: DJill

customer_reviews.title: NOT Smudge-Proof
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a smudge-proof eyebrow pencil, this one is not for you. I found the color a little on the dark side as well for my dark brown hair. It goes on well; it just doesn't last - at all.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: I’ll be buying this over and over again!
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty decent brows, but unfortunately I have a few little “gaps” from chicken pox and other scars through the years. I’m not one who’s ever fussed much with makeup, so I wasn’t sure if this would work for me without looking fake or obvious, and I was a little worried the blonde color might be too light- but it actually matches my natural brow SPOT ON and I can’t even tell it’s the product on those few gaps I’ve filled in. I’m so pleased it was so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Torice1995

customer_reviews.title: like a miracle
customer_reviews.text: A ordered the blonde color, despite that I'm a light warm brown almost auburn hair color, with a fairly light complexion. It was still slightly too dark. What I really like with this product is it adds color to the actual hair in my brows and the skin underneath. Blends well. A BIG difference in how my brows look. I'll be buying more. UPDATE: Still loving it! It colors the faded brow hair when I pull the flat side of the pencil lightly over the no color hair in the direction it's growing. Go lightly with this product first; you can always go back for a second round.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blonde and soft brown
customer_reviews.text: I ordered blonde and soft brown. I have blonde brows and it's hard for me to find brow pencils or pomades because they tend to look ashy or grey looking. This does not. I have tried so many pencils and pomades and this is my favorite. I definitely recommend. The 1st 2 pictures are are blonde after 8hrs of work. The last pic is of soft brown after applying. I just use the pencil to make my brows fuller and noticable when I'm not wearing full face of makeup
customer_reviews.author: ChristiTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Holy. Moly. Good.
customer_reviews.text: Omg. I haven’t been able to find that “holy grail” for my eyebrows because ones I’ve tried makes my eyebrows too dramatic or ones are not as color matched.. there’s always BUT with the eyebrow products I’ve used. Anyway, this one tho, fills in gaps, lets me shape my eyebrows and it looks so so natural. Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: LadyBug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Medium Brown
customer_reviews.text: I have dark eyebrows and I thought I had made a mistake ordering medium brown after reading few reviews saying this product is not very pigmented. I thought it would take me longer to do my browns building up color. However, I found the product to be perfectly pigmented. I am able to correct them very quickly and the color match my browns making them look natural. I’m just not very impressed about the longevity along the day, but for the price I can’t complain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for making filler brow hairs, hard pencil.
customer_reviews.text: A little bit of a harder pencil, but works really well for defined natural eyebrows. It's easy to make filler hairs with this because of the angled tip. If you want a softer pencil you can blow dry it for a few seconds on high to warm it up, or just warm it up on the back of your hand by rubbing it back and forth. I got the blonde color and it's not orangey or Auburn at all like blonde pencils usually are. It's a true neutral blonde, it would also work for more of a taupe color brow if you press harder with the pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Robotham

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people do not like the wedge shape. However, the wedge on this pencil is so small that you can be very precise with it! I am all about doing my brows quickly, and this made it very easy. The color is also very natural looking. I have dirty blond/light brown hair and I went with soft brown.
customer_reviews.author: doc2021

customer_reviews.title: Broke on my wife’s first time using.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my wife because I heard her saying she needed a new one soon and also was told it’s a good reliable brand name. She got excited when I surprised her with it, as soon as she opened it and used it was very disappointed with the first use. IT BROKE !I don’t know much about these products but don’t know if it was defected or why it happened. FYI personal experience.
customer_reviews.author: Beto

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Realistic results.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a variety of brow products, all more expensive, and Maybelline’s Total Temptation is the one I liked best! The tip is hard but not too hard and it makes very realistic looking strokes at the brow line. The color is perfect for my fair skin and dark ash blonde hair. I have already bought two more! I didn’t see any advantages with the pricier pencils. The Maybelline Total Temptation stays on reasonably well. It stays on through a dip in the pool and I can usually get through an intense barre class workout without needing to reapply.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie O

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing and too dry to work!
customer_reviews.text: This product just doesn’t make sense. I tried using it, videoed how to. It just didn’t work. It also seemed as though the product was old and dry! Maybe that was the problem?
customer_reviews.author: MrsMommyLoves7

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ok... I have seen many people say horrible things about this pencil mainly due to the company and testing. Let me just say... I'll do my part and give my honest review of the actual product. I LOVE this pencil. I'm horrible with my eyebrows and then I found this. It's not too dark or harsh. It is inexpensive and does it's job. This is probably the third one I've bought so far and I don't plan on that changing. My eyebrows look awesome and it's so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product. Fantastic Price.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Fantastic price. It replaced my high priced cosmetic that was inferior in quality, harder to use and smudgey. Thank you amazon customers ... it was all your votes that led me to this great find.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Works great to draw in eyebrows where you might not have them.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 74 year old women who has been wearing eyebrow pencil for quite a few years to cover the gray in my eyebrows. As I have gotten older i am also losing eyebrows so when I saw this on Amazon I decided to try it. I really like this because it covers the gray in my brows and I can color in my bare spots to look natural. I know there are other products out there to do the same thing but for this price, I’m very happy. I use it everyday and it has lasted a long time. I just ordered another one because I don’t want to run out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drugstore find
customer_reviews.text: After using a high end brow pencil with a similar tip to this, I was looking forward r a more affordable alternative. This works just as well as the high end one at a fraction of the cost. It has more color choices, and has the little spoolie in the end that I use every time. All of this makes me like it so much better.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brink

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My fav eye pencil! It’s not too dark but has enough coverage to fill in the gaps. I use it daily and the quality is very very good. I will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine R.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this one it smear to easily doesn’t last I prefer nyx
customer_reviews.author: lacy

customer_reviews.title: Good...but a bit dark for me
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but I wish it was lighter. I have a hard time finding an eyebrow pencil light enough to look natural! It wasn't red, though, which is a big plus. I find a lot of blonde pencils have red undertones.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Randolph

customer_reviews.title: High recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Matches my eyebrows perfectly; you can't even tell I'm wearing it! Very easy to apply. Not too hard, and not too smooth; very easy to control amount applied. I only need to apply it once per day. However, if you sweat a lot or have oilier skin, you might need to apply twice a day. The little end brush is helpful for shaping. For the price, you really get bang for your buck with this stuff. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy of Oz

customer_reviews.title: really easy to control b/c of the way it is shaped
customer_reviews.text: I usually use Avon Glimmersticks for eyebrows in blonde and it is hard to obtain so I wanted to find something to replace it. I ended up purchasing this and liking it even more because it glides on smoothly, with even color. With Avon's glimmersticks, because the product was a little oily, there would be patches of darker/clumpy eyebrow hair. This one glides on smoothly and even, really easy to control b/c of the way it is shaped. Even though it is blonde, it matches the shade of Avon's and isn't super dark but more brown than blonde. This is good b/c I have medium tan skin, extremely light Asian eyebrows, therefore anything too dark is overly dramatic.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Huynh Chhor

customer_reviews.title: Great for aging eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: Aging is a weird collection of body changes—so one day you notice you have almost no eyebrows but lots of funny little hairs on your chin. Fortunately, someone’s figured out some solutions and this is one of them. This is the easiest and most effective way to add some life to fading eyebrows I’ve tried (and I’ve experimented with a lot of them). Once I’ve filled in sparse areas, using the little brush on the end can smooth and blend the color in to get a pretty natural-looking result, one that will last all day. This is my second purchase—the highest recommendation I can give.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia P

customer_reviews.title: Barely There Brows?  This Is For You!
customer_reviews.text: Some women are into making their eyebrows look like a Nike symbol. Me? I just wanted something that would create natural looking brows or something that would at least show that I have brows, because they are non-existent; like newborn brows. This is by far #1 for creating natural looking brows. I have received compliments about how noticeable my brows are now which is sad come to think about it, but #dontcare! Thank you Maybelline for breathing color into my barely brows.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Needs Sleep

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: The color is a deep, blackish brown which matches my brows nicely. The consistency is good--not too creamy, not too waxy--and doesn't wear off easily. And, the price is right. But, it's more difficult to work with than with thinner pencils. I prefer to use several light strokes with a thin pencil (MAC Eye Brow Styler in Stud is my favorite) to achieve a natural look. When I was done using this pencil, I felt that my brows looked drawn on. Too bad they don't make this color and formulation in a thin pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Overall works as intended
customer_reviews.text: I have eyebrows that need enhancing. We will just leave it at that. I really liked the container and found that overall this product served the purpose & worked well. The application process was smooth. I purchased the brown color which worked well as I am a natural brunette. I would of given the product 5 stars but found that spoolie was not long enough. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Ody

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't wow me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this based on the excellent reviews. I survived the emo era, but my eyebrows did not (someone really should have held a tweezer intervention for me). My eyebrows just haven't been the same since. Instead of investing in costly microblading, I've tried different products hoping to achieve a fuller brow. I've tried this specific product twice, and I just don't love it yet. The color is nice, but I haven't been able to get that "wow factor" other reviewers have mentioned. While it does stay on well throughout the day, I can't say that it does a better job or goes on with more ease than the brow powder I was using before this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Dactyl

customer_reviews.title: ♥️ love
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for giving this ginger some brows! My eyebrows have been "invisible" my entire life... This helps make them just dark enough to look natural without being overbearing!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Light enough that it doesn't look "painted", but evens out my brows and the areas that are more sparse. I love the shape of the pencil, it makes contouring easy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rbash

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying a $25 eye brow pencil because it was a perfect shade and had good staying power. I saw this pop up on an article "50 must have beauty items under $10 on Amazon". For $5, it was worth a shot. I already have 3 of them. One the first use I was impressed. The shape of the head it PERFECT for application. Why aren't others like that?? You have to get this!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Best brow pencil ever!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite brow pencil! I was using another drug store brand and wasn't happy with it at all. I was looking online and was going to order something way more expensive that u can only get in high end stores and I came across this! I love the slanted edge! It not only fills in the hair where mine is very thin but allows me to "draw" on a lil more brows and they look so natural. It also stays put! There's no need to spend big $ on products when u have these!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bryant Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Alternative to High End Brow Pencils
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a replacement for a high end eyebrow pencil that I loved. It works just as well and it’s a quarter of the cost! My eyebrows are defined and they don’t look like they’ve been drawn in with crayon. Itching/heavy rubbing will move the product, but it all around stays on nicely throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyebrow pencil. Seeing more and more girls get their brows micro bladed, I'd rather just color them in a bit. The color is very natural and stays on all day (even after a sweaty workout at the gym). The only reason I gave it 4 stars is the product is not vegan and maybelline tests their products on animals, which is a downfall I hope they correct soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amylyru

customer_reviews.title: This Brow Pencil is Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've got sparse brows that only got worse after I had chemotherapy. Previous brands I used and liked were Mary Kay and Flower brand blonde. This looked interesting so I bought one, and it totally RULES!! Goes on smooth, color is comparable to the brands I'd used before, but the great thing is the shape of the pencil, you can draw wide lines and thin lines, it lasts pretty well (Flower might have a slight edge, both are good) but the ease of use is wonderful and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cleo Parker

customer_reviews.title: Gone too soon.
customer_reviews.text: This broke after about 2.5 weeks of use. It wasn’t dropped. It lived in my makeup case. It wasn’t even dialed up that much. Really loved the product... but didn’t last.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Mccarty

customer_reviews.title: Great brow pen!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pen! It glides on so nicely & does last me all day unless I rub it! Very nice for a lighter brow. My only complaint is that it doesn’t last very long compared to a traditional pencil. And, when it runs out, you don’t have much notice which can leave you in a pinch. But, I like the product enough to buy it again even though it is not as environmentally friendly as a traditional wooden pen.......hmm...wonder if I can recycle these...........
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISINGLY AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I admit I was surprised by how well this eyebrow pencil works! It has an angular, sharp edge, so you can duplicate brow hairs. It applies smoothly and evenly, the brush end then effectively blends your application for a lovely natural look. I wore all day, slept in it and it was STILL ON and looked perfect until I washed my face later the next day! Now THAT'S what I call a GREAT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Fashion Ragazza

customer_reviews.title: MEDIUM IS TOO DARK
customer_reviews.text: I have olive colored skin and light to medium brown hair. I thought the medium brown would be perfect for me, but it was way TOO DARK. This color might be suited for someone with black or really really dark brown hair, but if you have lighter brown hair or highlights you should use the soft brown.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not dark enough...application light over foundation.  Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had to draw in my eyebrows for years. I’ve been using regular eyebrow pencils until I tried this because of the rave reviews. I’m really not impressed. I draw my brows in a very natural way and with this pencil it really didn’t stick well over foundation and moisturizer. Plus the plastic applicator is a real drag as I’m trying to reduce my carbon footprint. Won’t be buying this one again. Gonna stick to the old school pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Finn

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after I couldn't get my more expensive usual one when I needed it. I like it! Goes on easily and stays in place. Almost as good as the $20+ one, except they don't last as long, a much softer pencil. I used the blonde one for my dark blonde hair and it was a good fit for me. I had tried the light brown, but found it too dark for how I wanted it to look. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Cost
customer_reviews.text: I was highly disappointed with this product, due to how quickly the product got used up. The pencil inside is definitely on the vertically challenged size!! It went on well and worked nice. But my granddaughter was able to find me a much, much cheaper Wet & Wild version of this that works just as good and has so far lasted three times as long as this Maybelline brand. I will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Grannidi56

customer_reviews.title: Five stars from a natural blond
customer_reviews.text: I’ve searched for this for 15 years! I have naturally blonde hair and can never find a shade that looks right — it’s always got a reddish tint or is too dark. This blond shade is perfect. The angled tip allows for great shape, which is a godsend from trying to draw that perfect shape every morning. I was skeptical at first with just the pencil, mostly because this takes so much less effort (and product) than usual. But once you use the little brush, just a couple of quick flicks and it blends flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ♥️ Just as good as goof proof for 1/4 the price ♥️
customer_reviews.text: Use good proof but shade 2 is always out of stock everywhere so decided to give this baby a try. Better price fast shipping color I want. As great as goof proof have new one on one brow goof proof on other and quality and application are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: PilatesMommy

customer_reviews.title: Certainly blonde
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally very golden light brown hair, and my brows are dark. Deep brown was too dark (a friend said the tone was also too greyed for me) and this blonde is an unfortunate mismatch. Would've worked great if my brows matched my hair. It's a solid product! I highly recommend and will be ordering the medium brown. Fingers crossed for a perfect match.
customer_reviews.author: Avabobava

customer_reviews.title: Pulls out eyebrow hairs
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get an affordable eyebrow pencil. Well, the search continues. I don't know if I got a bad one or if it's the blonde shade that's awful, but the color deposit is almost non existent. The worst part is that I've tried this several times and each time it yanks eyebrow hairs out. I hardly have any as is. I don't know how people are getting full coverage with this pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Lionheart

customer_reviews.title: My eyebrows are visible now
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something simple and affordable to color in my blond eye brows with. This works well and looks very natural! Easy to use and it lasts. Without coloring, they don't show up in pictures, so I'm happy to add some color that matches my hair
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for natural-looking eyebrow t
customer_reviews.text: This works well to discretely fill in a sliver of baldness in one of my eyebrows caused by a small scar. It’s easy to use and lasts quite a few months for me. It also removes easily with my makeup wipes. However, temperature changes can change how it applies to your eyebrows. I used it the other day after it had accidentally been warmed up a little bit, and it went from being like using a colored pencil to using a pastel. In other words, it went on much thicker and darker when it was stored in the heat of my purse. Otherwise, it’s been great.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never really understood the technique of achieving that perfect brow. But, this pencil made it sooo easy with its angled, retractable tip. I am NOT a makeup guru. I like simple to use products. I will buy this again & again. I got the Deep Brown color. Now a staple in my makeup bag.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa Cole

customer_reviews.title: Terrific eyebrow pencil for many reasons
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be my favorite eyebrow pencil. I’ve use Maybelline eyebrow pencils for years and the red pencils that I’ve used are softer than this material It’s a little more on the waxy side, so it’s not as smudgy and you can create definition with the pointy tip. As you use the pencil and it becomes rounded you can create this unique shape again by twisting a tad bit of pencil through and cut it straight across with a razor blade or sharp knife. The color is good and it doesn’t smudge. I like how you can create definition like hair strokes and blend it with the brush. Hopefully they’ll keep this design for a while .
customer_reviews.author: Damm Honest

customer_reviews.title: Have not found that perfect brow pencil.
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping this brand would be better or at least comparable to other brands. Not so. Just as smudgy and non long wearing as far as my experience proved. You would think these companies would be able to produce a better product at the price we pay? I have hardly any brows at all and need to fil in over permanent cosmetic brows that are now faded. I guess I'm a hard critic when it comes to brow liners.😲
customer_reviews.author: Wballen

customer_reviews.title: Only buy if you do not want small strokes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to all the great reviews. However, it is not what I wanted. The pen is really thick and does not give you a "natural" look. It is like I took a crayon and colored my eyebrows really thick. I tried using the pointer side and even that did not make a difference. I personally did not like it, but as you can see a lot of people do. Just my two cents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best eyebrow pencil ever!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best! I have always had really nice brows but for some reason, over the last year and a half they've been getting slightly patchy, and itchy. I wanted something to fill in the patches with. I have tried lots of products, most recently NYX and Anastasia, and they all work but this one is so much easier to use and the application is quick. I like the color. I have died blonde hair and natural cool brown eyebrows. The blonde looks really nice on me. Also, I don't seem to be allergic to this. It doesn't make me itchy, and the price is unbeatable for the quality!!
customer_reviews.author: yesamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great Brows!
customer_reviews.text: I did micro-blading two years ago and now that's starting to fade, making the areas of my brows that are missing or have very thin hair, more noticeable. I tried this product based on the reviews, and I have to agree- overall great product (and I've tired a lot of them). My natural hair is dark brown so the medium brown color for my brows fills in and blends nicely. The slanted angle makes it easy to fill in the natural shape of the brow. Until I get the nerve to do micro-blading again (because it hurts), this product will do just fine. Holds up well throughout the day, even during working out.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela G.

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I had more hopes for this brow pencil since the reviews were quite reassuring, but I found the pencil to be more difficult to apply nicely than my Anastasia brow product. It had an interesting tip to apply with which made my brows look messy and not cleanly defined. The coloring I chose was great, no complaints there. Just wished it might have been a simple round tip. I'll still keep it as a backup or for a really lazy makeup day.
customer_reviews.author: MeganMinefield

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: ive bought several other brow products and so far this has been the best one! It very easily can match multiple shades by just adding less or more product. My natural hair is a light- medium brown and after a few mishaps at the salon, my hair is now a chocolate dark brown (which I didn't want, I digress) and I just had a bit more product now and it matches perfectly! Id also like to note my moms hair is so dark brown it looks almost black and this same shade for my light brown hair works for her too!
customer_reviews.author: maurac

customer_reviews.title: First time user of brow product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used this type of product before, but I love this stuff!! It works great. Doesn’t smear doesn’t rub off. Looks great. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: AAC

customer_reviews.title: Great to find blonde in a mechanical pencil!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! it’s so hard to find blonde! It’s exactly what I needed. Goes on easily. Tip is wide, glides easily, and doesn’t break off like other mechanical brow pencils. Twists back in the tube when finished. Wooden pencils always need sharpening and seldom sharpen uniformly, and can be painful to use.
customer_reviews.author: JoanneJ

customer_reviews.title: Born with it, AND maybelline
customer_reviews.text: As a natural blonde it is extremely difficult to find make up products for my colouring. I have blonde eyelashes and brows. So when I try to fill in my brows it is very hard to find blonde colouring. This product is almost too dark, but it is close enough when blended! It is a nice colour and very true to what is pictured. The application is very easy because the product is very nice quality! I was surprised by how nice it was for Maybelline.
customer_reviews.author: dthlhm

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Better than most eyebrow products and comparable to more expensive products. I switched to this after getting frustrated with my expensive Lancome product that was difficult to apply. I've been very happy with this product and will likely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: DocHDL

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I did my brows before this. I don't have the best brows and with other pencils that are pointed it looked unnatural, but the beveled end makes them look great every time. I have this on save and subscribe so I never will run out. Please don't stop making. Please! I have blonde hair (light brown with blonde highlights) and I chose the dark brown color and I love it because it doesn't have any red/orange hues like so other products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyebrow Pencil I've Ever Used!
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap, this pencil has changed my life! I was lucky enough to get my eyebrows microbladed last year so I just wanted something that was easy to use to touch up the outline and this pencil is amazing! The actual supply within the plastic pencil cartridge is a little disappointing so I do feel like I'm paying a bit more than I normally would but it's hard to argue with results when I get compliments on my eyebrows! LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: A.Montez

customer_reviews.title: Good blonde eyebrow filler
customer_reviews.text: First of all, if you are looking to draw on eyebrows where there aren’t any, this might not be the best product for you. The pencil does not make a very sharp line. However, if you, like me, just need to fill in your existing blonde, not-very-thick brows, this this is just right. This brow pencil has a nice ash-blonde color. Others I’ve tried are always too reddish. I also like the brush on the end. It blends the color in while also smoothing/directing my natural brows. I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauriemo

customer_reviews.title: You pay for plastic!
customer_reviews.text: This works great but you hardly get what you'd expect in the whole thing. I rolled it out to see how long the stick of product was and it's tiny! It might last half a month of everyday use, just to fill in sparse spots. That's not even to shape and fill a whole brow. It your looking for a product that will actually last and has quit a bit of product. This is not it you pay for the plastic if the pen! Don't get me wrong it fills and blends nicely. Last all day and doesn't smear if you get sweaty but won't last but a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Brit8977

customer_reviews.title: Quick fix but not a 5 star product
customer_reviews.text: Ok so i only ordered this as quick fix because the product i use delivery time sucks. This will only be used in case of emergency. Easy to use however I thought because it was dual the other side had the brow gel as oppose to an eyelash brush. It’s not 100% smudge proof (which is why i expected the eyebrow gel) however it is rather long lasting than i expected. I do love that the color matched my skin tone. Price is reasonable but will not be buying again all because i am used to having a dual product that comes with the eyebrow gel.
customer_reviews.author: V V

customer_reviews.title: Better then Anastasia
customer_reviews.text: I had been using Anastasia brow products for years. And even though I do love them I wanted to find something more affordable. My friend told me about this eyebrow pencil so I decided to give it a shot. I can honestly say I am so happy with this product. I like it even better then Anastasia when before I couldn’t find anything like it. It’s very easy to use and glides on well. I love the little brush on the other end which blends out the color smoothly to give you a natural look. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J4short06

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh.... No thank!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw all the great reviews I was so excited to try it. I use ABH pomade and it takes awhile to use and expensive. I thought this product would be much easier. It seemed very dry and I had to really tug and push to get any pigment to show and noticed a few eyebrow hairs coming off when I was applying. I got medium brown and it seemed too dark. I probably won’t use it again. Luckily the price wasn’t too expensive but I’m not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: jj furman

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best!!! I have oily skin and this stays in place ALL day!! (14hrs+) Also, the chiseled tip makes this so easy to shape and draw. I use Dark brown for an outline of my brows and Blonde to fill in. My favorite pieces!! If I don’t wear any other makeup, I made sure to put this on!!!
customer_reviews.author: Delilah Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Dry and no color pigment payoff
customer_reviews.text: I have tannish brown skin and so the pigment didnt show up on me at all. I have to drag it hard against my skin in order to get color payoff. I think i got a defected one cause the pencil was super dry formula.
customer_reviews.author: asianwifey

customer_reviews.title: The perfect brow pencil for blondes
customer_reviews.text: I have very blonde brows and lashes. Id been looking for years! Finding a blonde brow pencil that looks natural has been a challenge in the past. The color is perfect, some blonde pencils have an orange tinge to them and some are just too light. These aren’t too light and not too dark. It’s perfect! The angled tip also helps with application. It does wipe off easily, but I’m generally not rubbing my face or brows so that hasn’t been a problem. I can’t speak to the other colors, but if you have blonde, hard to see brows you should definitely try these pencils!
customer_reviews.author: TEG

customer_reviews.title: ZERO Staying Power
customer_reviews.text: I realllllly wanted to love this product, because application is fast and easy in the morning to do in just a few minutes right before I walk the dog and get my morning starbucks before coming home to shower and then full makeup. The only problem with this eyebrow pencil is that it smudges soooooo easily. I have semi oily skin, but even when i use facial astringent before using this pencil, it still manages to smudge within an hour. Doesn’t help that i live in humid hot South Florida, but i’ve tried using primer before this, without primer, another base pencil before using this, brow pomade over this, but it eventually smudges, usually when i put on my sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Great tip
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyebrow pencil. The shape of the tip ensures that each stroke is sharp and doesn't wear down and change shape like other pencils
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a medium skin tone, sort of lighter in the winter months. I'm 56, hair is gray, but dyed to my natural dark blonde with blonde highlights. My eyebrows have always been as dark as my natural dark blonde, so I tried the 305 soft brown on my first order. It works fine, but I thought I would try the 300 Blonde, and it's perfect! I love this pencil! I've been using Anastasia Dip Brow in taupe and this works better because of the pencil. I don't like the spooly brush that is attached, but I have my own.
customer_reviews.author: SmartWAshopper

customer_reviews.title: If you have a few gray eyebrows, skip this product.
customer_reviews.text: A few of my eyebrows are gray and tweezing is not an option as they are in groupings so I'd have a bald spot on my eyebrows. I thought an eyebrow pencil would tint the gray, but it only tints skin. I put my pinkie behind a gray eyebrow to color on it directly, and it colored my pinkie but didn't have any effect on the eyebrow.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than filling in with powder
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This works great! I have my eyebrows tattooed but it has faded so I fill them in with powder. Let me just say I’m really bad at filling in my brows. Maybellines total temptation is a total winner! Loll at the difference in my video and photo. The photo is filled with my eyebrow powder and the video is with total temptation!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Sirimanotham

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: I have literally been looking for the perfect eyebrow pencil for years. I have had microbladed eyebrows for about two years now, but they get blurry really easily and I’m tired of paying for touch ups. This eyebrow pencil is the BEST!!!! It literally is so easy to use and the color is perfect- I used medium brown and I have dark brown hair and a somewhat olive complexion. I ordered the deep brown too but it looks too dark. This pencil is easy to use to fill in bare spots or light spots in my eyebrows. It looks so natural. I highly advise you to buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Easy for anyone to use!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a big makeup person, and I do not know how to do a lot with makeup. I typically wear mascara and lip gloss. But my eyebrows are thin and light (I am a redhead). The blonde color works perfectly, it is not too light or dark for my hair or complexion. It is super simple to apply and it looks natural! It does not look clown-like or really even like I have makeup on at all. I will definitely re-order this product and I would recommend it to all of the individuals like me who aren’t the most sophisticated with makeup application! I hope this helps others!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs out way too fast
customer_reviews.text: The color is alright and it's easy to use. I will not be buying again because it's the only eyebrow pencil that has ever lasted only lasted me two weeks. I know a rip-off when I see one.
customer_reviews.author: User101

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design, Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Used the product on my brows, and was incredibly disappointed with the design. Its shape is impractical for mimicking brow hairs (or anything relatively precise). I can't even keep it to use as eyeliner or whatnot. The makeup itself is so chunky that I often missed my brows when trying to fill them in, not easy to use, poor color match/payoff, wears-off regardless. I just wanted something quick and easy to make myself feel more confident while home and away from my usual makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel J

customer_reviews.title: Best eyebrow pencil ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have no problems pending money on high-quality makeup and actually can't remember the last time I bought something from the drugstore, but this brow pencil is my favorite. I also have Brow Flick and Boy Bros from Glossier, a Benefit brow palette, and and Anastasia pencil + clear gel and brown gel. You don't need to press down on this Maybeline pencil at all if you're just filling in and want a natural look. Seems like everyone who gave this one star pressed too hard, which no duh, would break the tip off.
customer_reviews.author: Stenographer90005

customer_reviews.title: Best eyebrow defining pencil!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time writing a product review because this product is so worth it! I’ve been relying on product reviews and ratings when purchasing stuff online. In some cases, it is disheartening because some reviews lack credibility, and it can be misleading for those who just want true testimonials to guide them with their buying experience. This product is absolutely the best eyebrow liner I’ve seen in the market! I can’t even imagine using another eyebrow pencil aside from this one. The shape of the pen itself helps you contour the shape of your eyebrow and the brush helps you to give that nice and clean look.
customer_reviews.author: Sherill Payumo

customer_reviews.title: I will buy this again and again
customer_reviews.text: This pencil always maintains a nice shape as you use it, allowing your brows to come out beautifully everytime. I have been searching recently for something VERY easy and inexpensive since I have 4 kids (3 of whom are girls who love to share) and this is the winner right now. The ONLY complaint i have is that it does smudge off if you are swiping your brow. I have minimal natural brows so this can suck for me but it's super easy to touch back up.
customer_reviews.author: Luckiecharms

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite brow pencil! There are 3 shades to choose from and the one I chose matches perfectly! I love the twist up feature and it doesn't twist back down whilst using it. The shape of the pencil tip creates perfection. Lasts all day but washes off easily. Haven't had any smudge or smear issues. I am sad however because towards the end of its life, the tip did break off a bit....but I loved it enough to order another one!
customer_reviews.author: V. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality .... Precision is off with the tip...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I am happy with the shade of brown and find it to be natural looking for every day brows if you are not seeking a dramatic look. Cons: I was excited to order this brow pencil, but disappointed with the quality of the tip. Any girl would ideally be seeking a precision point and this one is not precise. Specifically, it doesn't keep it's angled point on it's own. I explained more in my video and I hope you find it helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: This here is an eyebrow pencil
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for when you want slightly darker brows but don’t want to paint them on in precise lines. The brush is great for making sure it distributes to all your brow hairs. My only complaint is that sometimes I feel like I need to put it on in two layers to get the color I want, but that also prevents me from looking like a clown when I leave my house so that’s probably for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Blonde color is excellent for blonde hair or platinum blond or white hair.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised by this eyebrow pencil...by price and product that is easy to use and looks natural..not too dark. I ordered the blond color to blend blond and white and platinum eyebrow haircolors. The angled tip is perfect for filling in sparse areas. I also tried it as a liner for lower eyelashes and it looked very natural and compatible with eyelashes...what a nice surprise! I will keep using this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Diamond

product_meta.title: Maybelline Total Temptation Eyebrow Definer Pencil, Soft Brown, 1 Count
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1| Color:Soft BrownFill in and shape eyebrows with this must-have mechanical pencil. Also, discover more of Total Temptation, Maybelline's most addictive collection. It's designed for pure indulgence.
feature_bullets: Total temptation maybelline eyebrow pencil: Fill in eyebrows with this must have defining eyebrow pencil, featuring a teardrop tip. Shape with pencil & blend with the eyebrow spoolie brush, for a softly defined natural-looking brow

Define your brow: No eye look is complete without Maybelline Eyebrow Makeup frame your eyes & fill in brows with our precise Micro Eyebrow Pencil, TattooStudio Waterproof Eyebrow Gel, or arch defining Total Temptation Eyebrow Definer Pencil

Maybelline is the eye expert: Whatever your signature eye look, natural or dramatic, Maybelline helps create looks that draw eyes with a broad selection of pencil & liquid eyeliners, highly pigmented eyeshadows, iconic mascara, & eyebrow makeup

Maybelline has what you need to create any look foundation, bb creams, concealers, & highlighters for the perfect canvas, eyeshadows, brow pencils, & eyeliners for any eye look & lip products, from showstopping matte lipstick to au natural lip balms
Remove maybelline makeup with micellar water: Use Garnier Micellar Water as a gentle makeup remover at night, & as a facial cleanser in the morning to prep skin for Maybelline makeup

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
